auth.adaptablePerformanceDesc: Our product effortlessly adjusts to your needs, boosting efficiency and simplifying your tasks.
auth.builtToLastDesc: Experience unmatched durability that goes above and beyond with lasting investment.
auth.greatUserExperienceDesc: Integrate our product into your routine with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.
auth.innovativeFunctionalityDesc: Stay ahead with features that set new standards, addressing your evolving needs better than the rest.
auth.emailUpdates: I want to receive updates via email.

marketing.title: Our latest products
marketing.subtitle: Explore our cutting-edge dashboard, delivering high-quality solutions tailored to your needs. Elevate your experience with top-tier features and services.
marketing.terms: By clicking "Start now" you agree to our Terms & Conditions.
marketing.featuresDesc: Provide a brief overview of the key features of the product. For example, you could list the number of features, their types or benefits, and add-ons.
marketing.dashboardDesc: This item could provide a snapshot of the most important metrics or data points related to the product.
marketing.mobileIntegrationDesc: This item could provide information about the mobile app version of the product.
marketing.allPlatformsDesc: This item could let users know the product is available on all platforms, such as web, mobile, and desktop.
marketing.testimonialsDesc: See what our customers love about our products. Discover how we excel in efficiency, durability, and satisfaction. Join us for quality, innovation, and reliable support.
marketing.highlightsDesc: Explore why our product stands out: adaptability, durability, user-friendly design, and innovation. Enjoy reliable customer support and precision in every detail.
marketing.pricingDesc: Quickly build an effective pricing table for your potential customers with this layout. It's built with default Material UI components with little customization.
marketing.newsletterDesc: Subscribe for weekly updates. No spams ever!
